blogPost.title: What are your best tips for navigating difficult conversations? Answer by @xsvengoechea, Author of Listen Like You Mean It. https://t.co/sbcG6oqjRH https://t.co/JPZpCgnXx5
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 難しい会話を乗り越えるためのベストなヒントを教えてください。Answer by @xsvengoechea, Author of Listen Like You Mean It. https://t.co/sbcG6oqjRH https://t.co/JPZpCgnXx5
你有哪些驾驭困难对话的最佳技巧？回答者：@xsvengoechea, Listen Like You Mean It的作者。https://t.co/sbcG6oqjRH https://t.co/JPZpCgnXx5
你有哪些駕馭困難對話的最佳技巧？回答者：@xsvengoechea, Listen Like You Mean It的作者。https://t.co/sbcG6oqjRH https://t.co/JPZpCgnXx5

previous.title: How did you get celebrity investors to back you? Answer by Deon Nicholas (@dojiboy9). Co-Founder & CEO @forethought_ai. https://t.co/5xejCfo0Yl https://t.co/7FcKJ1vJZw

localize.full_text: どうやって有名人の投資家に支援してもらったのですか？回答者：Deon Nicholas（@dojiboy9）さん。共同創業者 & CEO @forethought_ai. https://t.co/5xejCfo0Yl https://t.co/7FcKJ1vJZw
你是如何让名人投资者支持你的？由Deon Nicholas (@dojiboy9)回答。联合创始人& CEO @forethought_ai. https://t.co/5xejCfo0Yl https://t.co/7FcKJ1vJZw
你是如何讓名人投資者支持你的？由Deon Nicholas (@dojiboy9)回答。聯合創始人& CEO @forethought_ai. https://t.co/5xejCfo0Yl https://t.co/7FcKJ1vJZw

next.title: What is the “scapegoat mechanism” and why does it matter? Answer by @lukeburgis, author of Wanting, 4x Founder & CEO, Professor of Business. https://t.co/63RcW9HJC0 https://t.co/VNxe5BQHrh

localize.full_text: スケープゴート・メカニズム」とは何か、なぜそれが重要なのか？Answer by @lukeburgis, author of Wanting, 4x Founder & CEO, Professor of Business. https://t.co/63RcW9HJC0 https://t.co/VNxe5BQHrh
什么是 "替罪羊机制"，它为什么重要？回答者：@lukeburgis，《想要》的作者，4x创始人& CEO，商业教授。https://t.co/63RcW9HJC0 https://t.co/VNxe5BQHrh
什麼是 "替罪羊機制"，它爲什麼重要？回答者：@lukeburgis，《想要》的作者，4x創始人& CEO，商業教授。https://t.co/63RcW9HJC0 https://t.co/VNxe5BQHrh
